website_summaries.verdict: Durable, waterproof, and long-lasting inflatable lounger at a great price.
pros: One of the cheaper loungers, durable fabric means it will withstand more usage on different surfaces
Company touts inflation will last 24 hours

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up. Packaging looks great. Inflated it and noticed 1 of 2 that I bought has defect on outside. About 5 spots are like this (See Pic). all in one line. Manufacturing defect. Gonna test it to see if it holds air or not Update: My boys love these inflatables. Bought 2 and 1 of them deflated quickly. Seller reached out and fixed that issue. Thank you for awesome items and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Better way to inflate
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept my only thing is trying to fill it up with air I have the hardest time getting it inflated fully. There has to be an easier way to get the air inside.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. I bought it for my nephew for his birthday and it was a big hit with all of the kids. There was a bit of a learning curve but once we figured it out it worked great. Seems like it is made of good quality fabric. It’s big enough for an average adult or a couple of kids. I will probably buy another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: T. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Get a long, running start to fill this bag
customer_reviews.text: I made a joke that I have to run down the entire block to inflate this. That said, I finally inflated it with an air pump. It is very comfortable when filled. And it's fun and lightweight. everything is great as long as you have an air pump or a source to fill it. Maybe it can get filled during a hurricane, but other than that, I don't know. I would buy it again for lesser money. or make sure you buy a wireless portable air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Jose H Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Nice for indoor conventions
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for my staff room at a convention I work at. They're a little tricky to get filled up with air but once you do it's a nice little cushioned laydown lounger! The material isn't the most forgiving especially in the summer- you're more than likely to sweat on it so put a towel over it, it will help
customer_reviews.author: E. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air - UPDATE BECAUSE OF SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Friends had a different brand and I really enjoyed it, so I ordered two of these to use and share. Inflated them immediately after receiving them since I was excited. Sealed them up, lay on them (indoors, and I'm 130 pounds) and they immediately start deflating. The opening is wrapped up more than 5 times, so they are just defective. Wrote customer service and their response was to send me the instructions on how to use the lounger. ---- Customer service was responsive and resolved the issue with me. Updated review to three stars due to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions multiple times , even used a fan to blow this item up. It did not blow up and when close to filling up I closed it as instructions said to do and air instantly went out of this item. I even had other people help follow the instructions to help use this item and neither could get it to work as listed .Very disappointed. Not bad to use as a tarp to cover camp wood as i did at camp because there was no other use for this item .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Lounger is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase, I got this lounger to use when we go to movies in the park or other outdoor events. I have to say inflating it was fairly easy, I read other reviews about how using a fan helps, and that’s how I inflated mine. It was very comfortable, even for me, being almost 7 months pregnant. I love the green color that I purchased and it’s very well made. It held air a lot longer than I anticipated. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: B. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but far from perfect
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the portability of this little couch. It's easy to set up, too, which was a real concern of mine after reading the reviews. Having average fitness and being able to "end" you're small dash helps. We got it on the second try. Comfort isn't great. Lying seems to be the best if you have a pillow. Reclining is a bit odd because the couch has you sitting deep in that crack along the middle. Sitting straight up is relatively comfortable if you have a back support. In all, it is better than nothing, comfort-wise. Finally, it is pretty loud. The material is very crinkly. Every movement is very audible, probably worse than, for example, a Walmart air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Macco

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to inflate but worth it! Just takes some practice!
customer_reviews.text: Oh what an interesting creation! Once you get it down though, it’s great! My 8 year old was able to do it although tired afterward. I love it and love how we can deflate it each time super fast!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBills

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephews after they saw my daughter's and loved it. We had an outdoor movie night and I inflated it for them to use in about 45 seconds. Super easy once you get the hang of it. These have room for 2-3 kids easy or for an adult to sit or lay down. Definitely would recommend for anyone who spends time outdoors and wants an easy lightweight place to sit or lay down.
customer_reviews.author: Guedo Fanony

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea, but waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Hard as heck to inflate! You need it to be a windy day then the thing would blow away of course. We took it to a beach in the summer and could barely get air in it. It was just enough to keep our belongings off the sand. If I could have returned it I would have. I have many people try to run and inflate it. Once time we got a small amount of air that was a nice seat for 1 person, but it wasn't enough air so they kept having to shift. With the max amount of air it would probably be comfortable. I don't know because we could never get enough air in it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about the inflatable lounger was its comfortable, what I didn’t like was the cheap material and it started loosing air within 4 hours. I followed the directions and within 8 hrs it was flat. The Q&A section on the instructions said the lounger stays inflated for 6-8 hours, wish I would have known that before I bought it but that’s my fault I should have I should have looked at the details more.
customer_reviews.author: mae edwards

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd of these that I purchased. The first held no air so I returned. Which was an easy process... it was inexpensive and I wanted to bring one camping so I ordered another hoping it was a fluke because of their pain free returns. This one I didn’t open until camping. It was difficult to inflate without wind, which was expected so not disappointing. It didn’t hold air for long, like maybe 10 minutes of use before needing to either tighten the strap or re inflate. I wonder if there is a legitimate brand to purchase from because it’s such a fun idea to have while camping. Would not recommend this product though.
customer_reviews.author: C_CWright

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap junk do not buy. The inner plastic lining inside the one pocket is so thin and flimsy it tore when it snagged on a hangnail! Update: I am changing my rating to help the average review score because their customer service is excellent. They reached out to me and offered a refund based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: BoiseBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfy
customer_reviews.text: A great quick option for sitting in your backyard, the beach, or the park... Once you master the twist/flip motion to capture the air and lock the ends it’s very easy....So far pretty durable... And easy to get the air out to roll it up and put it back in the bag to store it... Would not use it on concrete if you are a city dweller... Best to use on sand and grass only
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't the Product for me/Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my 5-year-old to have something to lounge on for an indoor kid's drive-in movie. A friend actually recommended this product. I felt awkward running in the parking lot trying to inflate the air sofa, after running for a bit, I was able to inflate but very minimal air was trapped. After about 5 minutes, my son was laying flat on the floor. Now, I won't say I knew exactly what I was doing, perhaps I missed a step. Overall, I was not impressed and the air sofa is now tucked away in my attic.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sauseda

customer_reviews.title: Does not fill up with air the way the manufacturers indicate it would
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to fill with air while at beach on a breezy day. Seems like it's a product that is sold until consumers figure out it does not work the way the manufacturers say. When enough consumers complain, then they take it off the market. Meanwhile they made their millions so they don't care. The one star review is actually misleading because it's not worth the one star. Another annoying thing is the bag which it's supposed to fit back into is so small it does not fit. Why do the manufacturers give bags that are too small for the product once it has been opened? Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Only inflates in a wind tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the ads where someone shakes it like a trash bag and it's suddenly full. This think needs a high wind or a fan...like the instructions even say you should fill it in front of a fan if there's no breeze. Duhfeets duh perposs.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Awful to inflate and keep full of air
customer_reviews.text: Total waste. Tried to inflate and sun in my backyard. Impossible to inflate and once you get air into it, it doesn't stay in. Thought maybe if I were somewhere windier it'd be better. Nope. Same issues. Don't bother getting it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Limpach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There is an inside lining and an outside tarp like structure. We were at the beach for like 8 hours and could never get it to work too bad the return window is shut. Especially because we bought two of them and they both suck.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time it takes to order it for same day delivery
customer_reviews.text: This think sucked. I used a fan to fill it. Not overly complicated. When I first laid on it, I thought... Not to bad, especially for the price. But within 5 mins I could tell it was loosing air. Within 15 mins my butt was touching the ground pushing the remaining air to the top and the bottom, so I was sitting with my feet and my head high off the ground. Returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased item for a movie night on the lawn. I decided several days before the event to inflat the air sofa to assure it would be okay. I used the fan to inflate the chair since there was no wind outside. As I inflated 1 side the other side would slightly deflate. Once all inflated the air sofa appeared to be fine nice and firm, my 40 lb nephew laid on the sofa for about 5 minutes got off and the sofa was no longer firm, it looked and felt a little saggy. I then knew it would not stand up to several hours usage.
customer_reviews.author: tara moses

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to put air into it.
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to put air in and tried several times by instructions and it is impossible. The method of putting air in it is a joke. I did not want a replacement and they sent it to me anyways. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Janet H.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart first use. This is the second one that I have purchased. The other one was from a different manufacturer. I gave it to a friend when I visited in Hawaii. I should have kept it if I would have known how hard it is to find a good one. This one is super cheap and ripped down the middle the first time I used it
customer_reviews.author: Kat Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to collect air
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to collect air, I have to wait air comes then collect air, but it’s really comfortable and price is awesome. If they design easier to get air that would be really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wells

customer_reviews.title: You'll look silly inflating it, but feel comfy laying in it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material, the orange is bright and fun but not TOO neon, just bright. Folds into the carrying case, which is cool. Comes with inflation instructions, but it pretty much works exactly as I expected! Really fun, everyone in the park was interested in it so it's a great conversation starter, too!
customer_reviews.author: ostrich_

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waster your time or money with this product. Very hard to inflate even when it’s windy and bec the hole is so big there’s really no other options of inflation. It’s just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann

customer_reviews.title: Bring wind. 15mph +
customer_reviews.text: The tubes for filling are way to narrow. Requires much higher filling pressure. FRETREE Inflatable Lounger Air Sofa Hammock - Portable Anti-Air Leaking & Waterproof. Much better, easier to fill. But, nearly 2x cost.
customer_reviews.author: William Dallam

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: Great backyard comfort but really could use some design improvement "needs a little air port" so you can top it off just a bit or adjust the air for comfort. All in all not bad I don't think I regret buying it but wouldn't buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: J.d klotz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but doesnt seem very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for deployment and everybody wanted one after they saw how fast I could inflate this and just chill. The only thing I dont like is that the stitching started coming undone after about 10 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Wikiwakawakawee

customer_reviews.title: Leaked within a month.
customer_reviews.text: It's not as easy as it looks to inflate and it started to leak within a month of having it. The stitches fell apart and the plastic insides were exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box still brand new to use for our camping trip. Several of us tried to inflate this garbage but of course maybe if you run 50mph with then that may be possible. Ridiculous and a waste of my money. Very disappointed in this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for my kids' Easter baskets and they are in love with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids' Easter baskets and they are in love with them. Super easy to fill (especially if there's a breeze) and much more comfy than lawn chairs. My daughter takes hers to all of her brothers' little league games and people are always coming over and asking where to get them. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: thatmom

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Inflate
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are somewhere windy or gustful it will be difficult. I even watched videos but none of us could get it. It's also a work out even when you get it right without enough wind. Bean bags are better.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rivenbark

customer_reviews.title: To fill it with air is almost impossible
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry but I tried everything to fill your product up with air and to enjoy it but it doesn’t work. I had multiple people also give it a shot and we still couldn’t make it work. I have no clue if there is a trick or anything but we did not had any success. I do love the product I wish it would work because I think it’s genius.
customer_reviews.author: Maik Kannenberg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The idea is nice, and yes it says to use with windy conditions, but trying to inflate this is impossible! The pics in the advertisement show being able to run and catch the air inside, but this is not the case. We have tried this and it did not work. My daughter got it for Christmas and is very disappointed it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easily deflates!
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to as far as inflating. You have to basically sit in one spot for air not to deflate. Really was wanting to buy a few more, but changed my mind!
customer_reviews.author: CRae

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these so fun and comfy great for travel does take so learning on inflating but really neat concept, got 3 one for each family member
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated for long
customer_reviews.text: This couch does not stay fully inflated for more than an hour. It deflates very quickly and does not stay inflated for the 24 hour time it promotes. I have had this for less than 30 days and i have used it in soft, non-rough surfaced areas. There are no holes in it and I followed the directions in order to inflate it, but still it does not stay inflated for long. Hope this helps for the potential buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lee Magle

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Quality in question.
customer_reviews.text: First air lounger I ever purchased. Pretty good concept and even comfy when inflated. Little hard to inflate but definitely doable. Mine came with the side pocket slightly torn. Seems like a quality control issue. I'm waiting to see if that deflates.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Compact and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Agreed that this air sofa takes some practice to fill but once you get the hang of it, it does fill quite easily. I initially ran a little ways but after filling a few times I was then able to just spin around and it filled easily. My boy wanted to lay on it both outside and then inside after we tested it out. Packs up quickly and easily into a small tote. Great prodict for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elise De Rose Rea

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Terrable does not inflate the way picture shows trued many times I live on beach and trued on windy days terrable very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: C......

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Can’t give much of a review as I returned it because even on a windy day it was extremely hard to inflate
customer_reviews.author: kathie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult but to inflate
customer_reviews.text: These thing are not easy to inflate. We read the instructions and still had to look up videos on how to inflate these. It is not as easy as they make it seem.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for camping.  Does not stay inflated overnight.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Bought two and neither stayed inflated. Should have just stuck with the tried and true foam sleeping pad so we didn’t have to sleep on the hard ground.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Cool couch
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing but my 10 yr old begged for it and said it was his favorite Christmas gift. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: To hard to fill, not really very convenient...
customer_reviews.text: It’s very hard to fill with air, not really what we thought. Other brands are a lot easier. It’s like the fabric is to thick... you can’t just swing it to fill it. Air flows out as soon as you get desired effect. I should have sent ours back!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy willams

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Is not working. The fabric is too stiff to work as promised. It will never inflate enough to give you a cushion.
customer_reviews.author: JackT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was great! Durable and light weight. Comfy. A little hard to inflate when there isnt wind to assist.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use indoors so I use a fan to fill it up which is easy enough however you would need to refill it often cuz after about 30 minutes I'm sitting on the floor because most of the air seeps out.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Anthony Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time trying to inflate it even had people at the beach trying to help me running with it. Lol it was hilarious but I think it’s because it’s too long and you need wind.
customer_reviews.author: sherrisoocool

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, kinda difficult to inflate if ur indoors or if there's no wind, but it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: It is a great concept but I’m not sure I’m going to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I am thinking I might have to hold it out the window in my car and drive around the block to get it blown up. It is not easy. It is a great concept but I’m not sure I’m going to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 Super hard to fill and then 1 wouldn't hold any air. Must have had a hole. Total waste
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay P

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Also doubles as fun float at the beach. I took it camping and everyone was fighting to sit in it. Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Domino

customer_reviews.title: Orange you glad you checked the reviews ?
customer_reviews.text: A pain to inflate but maybe part of the fun. as advertised and love the bright color
customer_reviews.author: Christie Mamanna

customer_reviews.title: We received a defect item
customer_reviews.text: We just recently used this product for the first time and after 30 mins of my 4 year old sat on it we noticed that the item was defective. There was a hole in it so it was deflating. We purchased a different one on amazon and have used it countless times. Disappointed that we didn’t test it out sooner to catch the defect, now it’s too late to return or exchange for another.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Noooooo
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this lounger for one month. It’s so hard to blow up and it must have a hole because it deflates within 15 minutes of lounging.
customer_reviews.author: CMancha

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Wow easy to carry and use this unbelievably cozy sofa. Since I move like to go camping with my bike this definitely make the job done. I might even use it in my room while surfing on the internet. Thank you seller for fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Hakan AYDOGAN

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, portable, and unique
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, and I always get people asking me “what is it”. Also very comfortable, and the side pocket is very convenient. Only negative is that it’s a little awkward to inflate (you have to run around and catch air), and it can be a little embarrassing to do it in public and fail. I recommend running against the flow of the wind, that works well!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use great travel. Blow it up and ready to layout Return to travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chunshine

customer_reviews.title: difficult
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping and kids BUT very hard to inflate especially if there is no wind to help!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: A great way to waste money.
customer_reviews.text: I wish i could give zero stars. Tried to inflate it as instructed. However it would not gather any air/inflate. Felt like a moron trying to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Insley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: Great knee air filled but not that easy to carry, wrap, and trap air in to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Erik A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to inflate like instructions, even though it was windy. Actually, had to use a pump and blow air in. I bought 2, one would not hold air at all and the other held air until you sat on it. And yes, we followed the instructions to a tee on closing it. Very disappointed. I strongly do not recommend wasting your money on this product. Definitely, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: marie curtis

customer_reviews.title: Hard to blow up
customer_reviews.text: We got 4 of these and we’ll they are a bit harder to pop up then I thought not like they show in video but once it’s up it’s comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to inflate as we expected
customer_reviews.text: definitely found it harder to inflate than what was shown in the videos
customer_reviews.author: R. Ziedenburg

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I get that this isnt "compact". Seemed made well just way too big for what i needed. It was as long as a queen bed w bedframe
customer_reviews.author: J Renee

customer_reviews.title: It leak air through seam already
customer_reviews.text: Good price but I order a few out of 6 two started to leak first time using
customer_reviews.author: Hotdeals

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money !!!!! Cheap don’t work
customer_reviews.text: This is not blowing up I want a refund your kidding me !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isela herrera

customer_reviews.title: Cool but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I like this design, and expected the challenges filling it (there's a learning curve) but the challenge is that the material is so noisy! Can't move or touch it without a racket! I'm not sure of it's durability... Yet
customer_reviews.author: Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy these again. My children used them once and the seams ripped and they popped. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to inflate only downside is that it started leaking and I haven’t heard back from the company about a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously comfortable! If you need to inflate this in a small space, use a hair dryer on no heat. Works very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for bikers
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Taking on a long motorcycle trip-size, ease of use, and comfort are great for long trips on a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The perfect beach lounger. It was very easy to set up and stayed fill for over 6 hours before we took it down.
customer_reviews.author: go_kendra

customer_reviews.title: Never got it to work- Returned
customer_reviews.text: I never got this to inflate, I didn't want to run a mile at full speed to make sure this thing got enough air in it to inflate. I wish there was a way to use a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Haleeeey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect at festivals, by the pool or just hanging out camping. Getting air in it is so simple - and taking the air out is just as simple. It is very small once deflated in order to travel with. We could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like but no.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold air and my bottom sinks to the ground. I can feel air escaping through the seams. Returned. I weight 180 lbs
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and handy. Used for the kids for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: You'd probably need a master's degree in engineering to get this to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: Not even on a windy day could I get this to inflate and stay inflated, even used a fan as the manufacturer suggested. It's basically a trash bag inside of a nylon bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Bag does not fill up very easily. The nylon system is lined with a cheap plastic bag equivalent to a ziplock.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Westberry

customer_reviews.title: Noninflatable
customer_reviews.text: Awful, Didn’t hold air at all. Directions say hold it open and run to collect air! Smh AWFUL..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for both gaming and napping
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have room to fill indoors use a fan. Need ample Space to fill by running or waving back and forth
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother buying beach chairs any more this is BY FAR the easiest to carry and comfortable thing out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno A.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t able to use
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t able to inflate it not easy to inflate was very unhappy 🙁 with this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for Camping
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this but the air only stays in for about 6 hours. Other than that good quality and decent price. Great to take to the park or camping.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Solid materials, holding up well
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few weeks since I ordered this, and it's still holding up to kids jumping on it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Barrus

customer_reviews.title: Imposible to inflate
customer_reviews.text: It is almost impossible to inflate this thing. Waist of money..
customer_reviews.author: Miña Haman

customer_reviews.title: air up lounger
customer_reviews.text: I cannot swing my arms fast enough to get the air in it. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old son loves this couch. He takes it with him to his friends’ homes to sit on to play video games and watch movies. It’s easy for him to inflate and quick to deflate, really light weight. I really thought it would have popped by now but it’s still holding strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost awesome
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this an awesome review bc it's easy and super comfortable, but I can't. I've used this for less than a week in my screened-in patio and it already deflates almost immediately. Sending back and ordering from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Must run in a straight line to fill up, hard to do and not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Good - Deflates quickly
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves the product. To inflate I used my battery operated leaf blower and it works great. I plan on taking the leaf blower camping with us now;) The problem is how quickly it deflates. It does not hold up a couple of hours none the less 24.
customer_reviews.author: BookGirl

customer_reviews.title: Dumbest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This product is ridiculous. Run to inflate it. Are you kidding me???? Couldn’t even hold my 12 year old. Bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a 12 year old. Hit of the party!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner K

customer_reviews.title: Price (unfortunately) = quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my seams busted almost immediately. I was the only person in it and I dont think I jostled it too hard. Still holds air but I'll probably return it for another sturdier brand
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea ward

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than others
customer_reviews.text: While I like how this one looks and the extra "headrest," it is smaller than the others that I have that were about the same price. It's not shorter lenghtwise, it's just lower. Some people might not mind but I like the larger ones so I returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Cheap clips
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the clips that held the air in just snapped. It will not work without wind and it won’t fill up with running.
customer_reviews.author: Yailiz

product_meta.title: JSVER Air Sofa, Inflatable Lounger Inflatable Couch for Travelling, Outdoor, Camping, Hiking, Beach Parties, Picnic, Backyard, Lakeside, air Hammock Inflatable Lounger, Inflatable Lounger for Adults
feature_bullets: Easy to Inflate: Please inflate the lounger in windy conditions. If it's a windy day, simply open the mouth of the lounger into the wind to inflate. Please do not run in circles with the lounger in-hand. Use a fan to fill it up if the wind is negligible or if you're at home.
Anti-deflation: Once the lounger is inflated, it will stay inflated for approximately 24 hours.
Square-shaped headrest: The upper back support and carefully designed ergonomic headrest provides the ultimate comfort experience.
Indoor & outdoor: Suitable for many occasions! Perfect for camping, outdoor BBQs, swimming at the beach or by the pool, backyard fun and many more.

Extreme durability: The well-knitted light and thin JSVER inflatable lounger is made up of high density 210T rip-stop nylon and built to withstand a wide range of flat surfaces including sand, grass and even gravel.
